text: The 2015–16 Puebla F.C. season was the club's 69th professional season in Mexico's top-flight football league. The season is split into two tournaments—the Torneo Apertura and the Torneo Clausura—each with identical formats and each contested by the same eighteen teams. The club also played Supercopa MX and Copa Libertadores. ==First-team squad== For recent transfers, see List of Mexican football transfers summer 2015. ==Supercopa MX== ===Match details=== {|
